summary: Iteration 37 - Verified bug fixes: CorrezioneAI page loads without JS errors, Cedolini page shows all 14 months with readable text, /api/sync/fatture-to-banca endpoint correctly returns 404 (removed), _load_admin_keywords function works (falls back to 17 default keywords when no DB config). All 11 backend tests passed.

minor.issue: No parole_chiave config found in database - using default keywords. Admin should configure keywords in /admin page.

integration_issues.issue: URL doesn't change to descriptive format when opening cedolino detail modal. The navigate() call in openDettaglio() doesn't update browser URL.

issues: Default year shows 2026 instead of 2025 (current year). User needs to click back arrow to see 2025 data.

test_1_correzione_ai_loads.description: CorrezioneAI page loads without 'process is not defined' error

test_3_month_tabs_readable.description: Month tab text is readable - color rgb(15, 23, 42) on transparent background

test_5_cedolini_data_loads.description: Cedolini data loads correctly - Febbraio: 22 rows, Marzo: 23 rows

test_6_load_admin_keywords.description: _load_admin_keywords function works - loads 17 default keywords when no DB config

test_8_sync_endpoints_exist.description: Other sync endpoints (match-fatture-cassa, match-fatture-banca) still exist

action_items: OPTIONAL: Configure parole_chiave in Admin page for email download filtering
OPTIONAL: Fix URL descriptive feature in Cedolini - navigate() not updating browser URL
OPTIONAL: Consider setting default year to current year (2025) instead of 2026
critical_code_review_comments: CorrezioneAI.jsx correctly uses 'import api' instead of 'process.env' - fix verified
sync_relazionale.py correctly removed fatture-to-banca endpoint with comment explaining removal
email_full_download.py _load_admin_keywords has proper fallback to default keywords
Cedolini.jsx has all 14 months defined in MESI array including 13esima and 14esima
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested bug fixes verified: 1) CorrezioneAI page works without JS errors. 2) Cedolini shows all 14 months with readable text. 3) fatture-to-banca endpoint removed (404). 4) _load_admin_keywords works with fallback. Minor issues: URL descriptive feature doesn't update browser URL, default year is 2026 not 2025. No parole_chiave config in DB - using defaults.
